arts.ttl: Official: Luca Zufferli to officiate Milan vs. Pisa – near-perfect record so far
arts.sum: By: Ben Dixon This weekend’s game between AC Milan and Pisa will be officiated by Luca Zufferli, who has only taken charge of one Rossoneri game previously. The AIA, the Italian Referees Association, announced the designation for the game on October 22, and Zufferli will take charge at San Siro on Friday. Rossi and Mastrodonato will help officiate, […] The post Official: Luca Zufferli to officiate Milan vs. Pisa – near-perfect record so far appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: GdS: Balentien joins the extensive Milan injury list ahead of Pisa game
arts.sum: By: Ben Dixon Whilst it is not a significant blow, AC Milan will not be able to bring Cheveyo Balentien off the bench for the game tonight. There have been several injuries for Milan to contend with in recent weeks, and it seems that there is another that Massimiliano Allegri will have to consider when naming his squad […] The post GdS: Balentien joins the extensive Milan injury list ahead of Pisa game appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: AC Milan v Pisa: top versus bottom
arts.sum: Pisa’s only win at San Siro against Milan came in Serie B, a 1–0 on 24 May 1981 (decisive goal by Chierico in the 22nd minute); the head coaches were Massimo Giacomini for the Rossoneri and Lauro Toneatto for Pisa. Matchday 8 in Serie A Enilive kicks off with league leaders AC Milan taking on Pisa, who are looking to lift themselves off the foot of the table.

arts.ttl: Meeting again after almost 13,000 days: All the key stats ahead of Milan vs. Pisa
arts.sum: By: Ben Dixon On Friday night, AC Milan will welcome Pisa to San Siro for their first encounter this side of the millennium, hoping to extend their fine form. arts.ttl: Leao aims for consistency as Milan host Pisa at San Siro
arts.sum: Max Allegri’s Milan return to action tonight against Pisa in the opening match of Serie A’s eighth round. The Rossoneri, after their strong home win over Pioli’s Fiorentina, must secure more valuable points to stay on track with their goal. arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan welcome Pisa to San Siro on Friday night with the possibility to secure top spot for the weekend with a win.
